Message.Title: Internet Explorer vs Firefox
Message.Msg: OMG! I just downloaded Firefox and all my internet problems went away! Everything loads faster and my system runs smoother No wonder they call it "Internet exploder" I'll never go back Sorry Microsoft, You just aren't good enough anymore. . .
